title: LDL
author: LDL
created_time: October 26, 2022, 01:05:41 PMLast edit: October 27, 2022, 12:36:29 AM by LDL
content: Next October 31st is Halloween as well as Bitcoin White Paper Release Day. Â On October 31, 2008 , a pseudonym named Satoshi Nakamoto published the Bitcoin white paper on his own website.At GlanceBitcoin Whitepaper featuresCreator: Satoshi NakamotoPublished date: 31st October 2008Former name: P2P electric CashPresent name: BitcoinWhitepaper pages: Nine(9) pagesFirst bitcoin receiver: Hal Finney (12 Jan 2009)Bitcoin Whitepaper publisher: Cryptography Mailing (Metzdowd)First website: www.bitcoin.org, satoshin@gmx.comNB: Please quote for images visible

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Thanks for this post - a nice gentle reminder for all that Bitcoin is the first blockchain and it started the revolutionÂ  If you havenâ€™t read it, take a bit of time off this week and have a read AND check out the references too(very important).Please use this website https://bitcoin.org/en/bitcoin-paperNOT the .com website!!Enjoy all

comments.author: NotATether
comments.body: Quote from: LDL on October 26, 2022, 01:05:41 PMNext October 31st is Halloween as well as Bitcoin White Paper Release Day. Â On October 31, 2008, an impersonator named Satoshi Nakamoto published the Bitcoin white paper on his own website.At GlanceBitcoin Whitepaper featuresCreator: Satoshi NakamotoPublished date: 31st October 2008Former name: P2P electric CashPresent name: BitcoinWhitepaper pages: Nine(9) pagesFirst bitcoin receiver: Hal Finney (12 Jan 2009)Bitcoin Whitepaper publisher: Cryptography Mailing (Metzdowd)First website: www.bitcoin.com, satoshin@gmx.comNB: Please quote for images visible Quoted.You said "impersonator", I hope you are not referring to the impostor Craig Wright.

comments.author: BitcoinBarrel
comments.body: Has it been 14 years already? Go Bitcoin Go! You are the King of Crypto BTC

comments.author: topman21
comments.body: Quote from: BitcoinBarrel on October 26, 2022, 02:00:57 PMHas it been 14 years already? Go Bitcoin Go! You are the King of Crypto BTCIn this way, one day we may be lost in the flow of time.Â  Because there is a saying in English that time and the flow of the river never stop for anyone.Â  The eternal stream always moves forward at its own pace.Quote from: LDL on October 26, 2022, 01:05:41 PMNext October 31st is Halloween as well as Bitcoin White Paper Release Day.Â  On October 31, 2008, an impersonator/pseudonym named Satoshi Nakamoto published the Bitcoin white paper on his own website.At GlanceBitcoin Whitepaper featuresCreator: Satoshi NakamotoPublished date: 31st October 2008Former name: P2P electric CashPresent name: BitcoinWhitepaper pages: Nine(9) pagesFirst bitcoin receiver: Hal Finney (12 Jan 2009)Bitcoin Whitepaper publisher: Cryptography Mailing (Metzdowd)First website: www.bitcoin.org, satoshin@gmx.comNB: Please quote for images visible This is undoubtedly an important post. Newcomers to the forum will know very well about Bitcoin's past. Thanks for such a valuable post.

comments.author: so98nn
comments.body: Beautiful month for bitcoin. Already celebrating 14th anniversary of bitcoin, time literally fly bye quickly. Though it would be amazing to see more developments in the bitcoin world. Surely we have blockchain which has gone far into the system. Even many governments taking reference and adopting blockchain in various works.Â  Definitely good to see that side of progress. However, hope so they accept bitcoin into their system and let us live free lives by keeping crypto decentralised for us. Happy 14th Anniversary!

comments.author: Dimitri94
comments.body: Really great, Who would have thought that this paper would one day be read with attention by people all over the world? Bitcoin is not just a payment method today. It has flourished as a reliable currency throughout the world. Today lots of people find their meaning of life through Bitcoin. So we need to keep everything related to bitcoin. Next October 31, 2018 is the Bitcoin whitepaper release date which brings us back to that day. Some revere that day and some regret.

comments.author: n0nce
comments.body: Please remove the 'impersonator' term for describing satoshi.  He impersonated no-one. He was a pseudonym, but not an impersonator.Quote from: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ImpersonatorAn impersonator is someone who imitates or copies the behavior or actions of another.

comments.author: LDL
comments.body: Quote from: n0nce on October 26, 2022, 11:57:47 PMPlease remove the 'impersonator' term for describing satoshi.  He impersonated no-one. He was a pseudonym, but not an impersonator.Quote from: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/ImpersonatorAn impersonator is someone who imitates or copies the behavior or actions of another.Ok ðŸ‘Œ, I already removed complicated word impersonator . Here I used impersonator word as hide, pseudonym, unknown but wiki provides others which correct.Thanks @n0nce for correct me.

comments.author: n0nce
comments.body: Quote from: NicNacCoin on October 27, 2022, 10:15:52 AMQuote from: LDL on October 26, 2022, 01:05:41 PM~9 pages bitcoin Whitepaper just I heard it first time . You are on Bitcointalk since 2017 and have never heard about the Bitcoin whitepaper? It's actually even linked up top on the forum on every single page, whenever there is no seasonal message like the current pumpkin carving contest.Quote from: NicNacCoin on October 27, 2022, 10:15:52 AM31 Oct just Bitcoin is about to turn 14.Â  Actually time never interrupts the frame.What does this even mean?

comments.author: DapanasFruit
comments.body: This important date is one of some unforgettable history landmarks for Bitcoin and I am happy to see the BTC community always remembering things as they did played significant milestone with the King of Cryptos. I am sure that back in the day, Satoshi Nakamoto never thought that 14 years after the WhitePaper got published, what he started as just a small fire can be creating an avalanche of support and for BTC to be recognized as an important asset that is now freely traded. What Satoshi simply dreamed of is now an unstoppable movement that nobody can stop and kill. Long love all Bitcoin lovers, supporters and enthusiasts.

comments.author: Frankolala
comments.body: It is a remarkable day in history for Bitcoin investors,Â  I never new these last year because I was unaware of Bitcoin. I am happy this year to be part of the people celebrating the white paper day creation by Satoshi Nakamoto. It is fourteen years presently with Bitcoin spreading wide and withstanding all challenges it has been facing. In another fourteen years from now Bitcoin would have gained solid ground over fiat currency. Fourteen your buying of goods and services has been going smoothly for people using bitcoin for their transactions. The decentralized system is the best in all of it.Thanks to Satoshi Nakamoto for this great treasure.

comments.author: Lizzylove1
comments.body: I daily wonder how I would have survived a brutal inflation in my country with wife and kids if bitcoin wasn't born, thanks to God for protecting Satoshi and giving him inspiration to create a value that will later liberate people from wicked government. Thank you bitcoin.
